## Plugin interface

The interface that should be returned by a `PluginInitializer`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Plugin<TSetup, TStart, TPluginsSetup extends Record<string, unknown> = {}, TPluginsStart extends Record<string, unknown> = {}> 
```
